titles.title: A bill to authorize the awarding of the Medal of Honor to Woodrow W. Keeble for his acts of valor during the Korean conflict.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
3/23/2007--Introduced.
Authorizes the President to award the Medal of Honor to Woodrow W. Keeble for acts of valor as an acting platoon leader during the Korean conflict.
